name: idk (Muffyy)
description:
This is still in development so there will be bugs.

Hold Shift while walking to sprint

Left Click to use your katana

Right Click to Shoot

For now I am focusing on the core component of the game. Currently I am using the default map and arm that come with unreal engine. I am planning on modeling my own arm cuz I don't wanna get copyrighted,
